author: Barbara Boland
title: How China’s Lies Brought the World to Its Knees
description: Unbowed, Beijing is now waging a disinformation campaign against the U.S., while redirecting and withholding medicine and supplies. The post How China’s Lies Brought the World to Its Knees appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Unbowed, Beijing is now waging a disinformation campaign against the U.S., while redirecting and withholding medicine and supplies. The breathtaking negligence of Communist Party officials for over a month after the COVID-19 outbreak led directly to the pande… [+9240 chars]
